thread.title: Jurgen Klopp dreams of Liverpool winning their last 14 Prem games to pip Chelsea to title – but he boasts eerily similar record to predecessor Brendan Rodgers
thread.title_full: Jurgen Klopp dreams of Liverpool winning their last 14 Prem games to pip Chelsea to title – but he boasts eerily similar record to predecessor Brendan Rodgers

author: ituckey
title: Jurgen Klopp dreams of Liverpool winning their last 14 Prem games to pip Chelsea to title – but he boasts eerily similar record to predecessor Brendan Rodgers
text:
EFL ANFIELD OF DREAMS Jurgen Klopp dreams of Liverpool winning their last 14 Prem games to pip Chelsea to title – but he boasts eerily similar record to predecessor Brendan Rodgers 
The Reds have had their worst calendar start since 1954 but boss still believes they can overhaul the Blues' 13-point lead By PHIL THOMAS
